trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bloomer
There was one other sighting in Bloomer on or around October 31st 1996
Summary: Woman dragged from bed; possible abduction.
divs: Sighting DetailsA woman awoke when her shoulder was touched. Something grabbed her feet, flippedher over onto her stomach, then dragged her toward the foot of the bed. Herhusband failed to stir despite the disturbance of her landing on him whenflipped. She lost consciousness when partly out of bed. She awoke anundetermined time later in the kitchen, observing a beam of light through thewindow from above the house. The sliding window was off its track and angledoutward. She felt a hand and sensed an unspoken message of reassurance and toreturn to bed. She awoke a short time later, frightened and with a soreshoulder.
